languages.text: "Сказал бы, что это удобное место для допроса псайкеров, но... Мне тут не по себе. Лучше бы нам убраться и забыть сюда дорогу".
languages.translation_comment:
On a planet with a creepy bottomless hole in the ground.
Idira: "It's weird... My mind is completely empty. Not a single whisper, no premonitions. Nothing. Just empty."

traits.locale_text: "Сказал бы, что это удобное место для допроса псайкеров, но... Мне тут не по себе. Лучше бы нам убраться и забыть сюда дорогу".

languages.text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."
languages.translation_comment:
On a planet with a creepy bottomless hole in the ground.
Idira: "It's weird... My mind is completely empty. Not a single whisper, no premonitions. Nothing. Just empty."
languages.original_text: "Сказал бы, что это удобное место для допроса псайкеров, но... Мне тут не по себе. Лучше бы нам убраться и забыть сюда дорогу".

traits.locale_text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... Something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget the way back."
"I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... Something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget the way back."
"I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."
"I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."
"I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."
"I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."

languages.text: 「ここは異能者の尋問には都合がいい場所だって言いたいところだが…何かが引っかかる。ここを離れて、どうやってここに来たのかなんて忘れたほうがいい」
languages.original_text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."

traits.locale_text: 「ここは異能者の尋問には都合がいい場所だって言いたいところだが…何かが引っかかる。ここを離れて、どうやってここに来たのかなんて忘れたほうがいい」

languages.text: "Ich bin geneigt zu sagen, dass man hier deswegen bestens Psioniker verhören kann, aber ... irgendwie macht es mich auch nervös. Wir sollten gehen und vergessen, dass wir je hier waren."
languages.original_text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin geneigt zu sagen, dass man hier deswegen bestens Psioniker verhören kann, aber ... irgendwie macht es mich auch nervös. Wir sollten gehen und vergessen, dass wir je hier waren."

languages.text: « Je dirais bien que cela rend cet endroit idéal pour interroger les psykers, mais... il y a quelque chose qui me perturbe. Nous ferions mieux de partir et d'oublier le chemin de cette planète. »
languages.original_text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."

traits.locale_text: « Je dirais bien que cela rend cet endroit idéal pour interroger les psykers, mais... il y a quelque chose qui me perturbe. Nous ferions mieux de partir et d'oublier le chemin de cette planète. »

languages.text: «Me gustaría decir que eso lo convierte en el escenario ideal para interrogar a un psíquico, pero... hay algo que me pone los pelos de punta. Deberíamos marcharnos y olvidar que hemos estado aquí».
languages.original_text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría decir que eso lo convierte en el escenario ideal para interrogar a un psíquico, pero... hay algo que me pone los pelos de punta. Deberíamos marcharnos y olvidar que hemos estado aquí».

languages.text: “我想说，这个地方非常适合审讯灵能者。不过……不知为何，这里让我感觉心神不宁。我们应该赶紧离开这里，最好连怎么来这里的都彻底忘掉。”
languages.original_text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."

traits.locale_text: “我想说，这个地方非常适合审讯灵能者。不过……不知为何，这里让我感觉心神不宁。我们应该赶紧离开这里，最好连怎么来这里的都彻底忘掉。”

languages.text: "Burası aslında ruhsezerleri sorgulamak için ideal bir yer ama burada beni rahatsız eden bir şey var. Gidelim, geldiğimiz yolu da unutalım."
languages.original_text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."

traits.locale_text: "Burası aslında ruhsezerleri sorgulamak için ideal bir yer ama burada beni rahatsız eden bir şey var. Gidelim, geldiğimiz yolu da unutalım."

languages.original_text: "I want to say that makes this place convenient for interrogating psykers, but... something about it puts me on edge. We should leave and forget how we ever got here."
